title: How to charge a cell phone battery out of the phone - Quora

response.answer_text: It someties seems too simple from some videos… There is only one thing you need to know: Do not start doing it if you do not know about all the pitfalls. You coud brick your phone. On the other hand there are very experienced people and great and moderately priced service places. Just find them.

Get a charger appropriate for the cell type, usually lipo - lithium polymer so 4.2v max charge usually. Attach it to the positive and negative contacts and begin charging at a modest rate like 0.2-0.5 amps. The charger will stop when it's charged. This type of charger:
